Package dev.negativekb.api.util

Class ItemBuilder

java.lang.Object
dev.negativekb.api.util.ItemBuilder
public class ItemBuilder extends Object
Easily create itemstacks, without messing your hands. Note that if you do use this in one of your projects, leave this notice. Please do credit me if you do use this in one of your projects.
Author:
NonameSL

    • setDyeColor

      public ItemBuilder setDyeColor(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.DyeColor color)
      Sets the dye color on an item. * Notice that this doesn't check for item type, sets the literal data of the dye-color as durability.
      Parameters:
      color - The color to put.
